title: Choco-coco cupcakes
ingredients: ['300g plain flour', '310g caster sugar', '220ml oil', '3 eggs', '100g desiccated coconut', '75ml coconut milk', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'Chocolate ganache', '180g plain chocolate, 85% cocoa, chopped', '250ml double cream']
